headline: HII Completes Acceptance Trials for Destroyer Ted Stevens (DDG 128)
summary: PASCAGOULA, Miss., Nov. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII’s (NYSE: HII) Ingalls Shipbuilding division successfully completed the final round of sea trials for Arleigh Burke-class guided missile destroyer Ted Stevens (DDG 128). The Ingalls Test and Trials team spent several days in port and at sea conducting a comprehensive series of acceptance test and evaluations, overseen by the Navy’s Board of Inspection and Survey (INSURV). These trials confirmed that the ship successfully demonstrated requir

headline: HII Delivers Virginia-Class Submarine Massachusetts (SSN 798) to U.S. Navy
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., Nov. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) announced today that its Newport News Shipbuilding division has delivered Virginia-class fast-attack submarine Massachusetts (SSN 798) to the U.S. Navy. Massachusetts is the 12th Virginia-class submarine delivered by NNS, and the 25th built as part of the teaming agreement with General Dynamics Electric Boat. It is the fifth Navy vessel named for the commonwealth of Massachusetts. “Delivering Massachusetts after its rigorous se

headline: Huntington Ingalls Stock: Analyst Estimates & Ratings
summary: Huntington Ingalls has beaten the broader market over the past year, and analysts maintain a steadily upbeat view of the company’s outlook.
